Posts.Content: Mar 9, 2012 10:01AM - edited Mar 9, 2012 10:03AM by acope Taking CO Q-10(100 mg)  will leave you mouth soreless.  I battled these nasty sores the first time I was diagnosed with bc during my chemo treatment's. I have bc mets to liver now and someone enlightened me on taking these and it's been so nice not to have them.  I take them everyday.  Hope this help's.
